ruleset.name: Security
ruleset.description: Rules that flag potential security flaws.

rule.name: IframeMissingSrcAttribute
rule.message: IFrames must have a src attribute.
rule.description: IFrames which are missing a src element can cause security information popups in IE if you are accessing the page through SSL. See http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;EN-US;Q261188

rule.name: NoUnsanitizedJSPExpression
rule.message: Using unsanitized JSP expression can lead to Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks
rule.description: Avoid using expressions without escaping / sanitizing. This could lead to cross site scripting - as the expression would be interpreted by the browser directly (e.g. "<script>alert('hello');</script>").
rule.example: <%@ page contentType="text/html; charset=UTF-8" %> <%@ taglib prefix="fn" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/functions" %> ${expression} <!-- don't use this --> ${fn:escapeXml(expression)} <!-- instead, escape it --> <c:out value="${expression}" /> <!-- or use c:out -->
